review: voice recognition only works on Amazon apps movies and TV shows. Sometimes the voice recognition doesn't work or miss spell's the word or words of a movie and shows no results. Its missing other content like national news that is available on roku 2.  It's ok and the voice feature is nice and might save you a little time, but in the end I think Roku 2 is a much better, especially considering it's half the price.
author: Eric McPherson

review: I ordered this after seeing the commercial with Gary on TV and talking about it with a friend.  As a PRIME MEMBER, I am happy to be able to watch my PRIME available movies and shows on my TV instead of on my computer.  This is way simple to hookup and use.  So far, I am very pleased with this.
author: Charlie Johnson

review: Love the HD audio & video quality, the simple design of the set up and main page and the jitter-less streaming of the content.I do have a problem with Amazon's advertisement of 40,000+ free movies and TV for Prime member's, I really doubt there are that many choices that are "free", most better movies have to be purchased which is all too easy seeing the fee is tied into your Prime account, some what disappointed about being mis-lead.
author: Christopher Loranger

review: Absolutely love my Amazon Fire TV. Starts up right where you left off in a series. Awesome quality. Love it!
author: D. Parker

review: This FireTV unit always tells me that my internet connection is too slow.  I have never had that problem with my Roku box, never, and it works perfectly.  I no longer use the FireTV and will stick with Roku.
author: T. Frum "Terry"

review: A lot of power for a little box.  Easy to navigate with a ton of extras.  Also enjoy the prime benefits.  Voice recognition is as advertised.  I like it.

review: I have the Roku3 which I still use. But the Amazon fire TV with its bigger processor can play Netflix , from start to finish with a movie and not stop and buffer once, and Huluplus. And I don't have a big download speed. I think as they get more apps they will become number one, on account of the processor they use.
